p: Most of viral diseases are endemic to Ethiopia [ 168]. Serosurveys have demonstrated the high prevalence rate of HBV [ 169, 170], HCV [ 170], HIV [ 171], and HSV-2 [ 137]. The population is vulnerable to rabies [ 172] and influenza [ 173]. Rotaviral diarrhea is the leading cause of morbidity and mortality in children [ 174]. Recently, like other nations in the globe, public health and economic sectors of Ethiopia are heavily challenged by COVID-19 pandemic.
